trans-unit.source: The Hybrid Connection Manager enables your on-premises machine to connect to Azure and relay TCP traffic.
trans-unit.target: The Hybrid Connection Manager enables your on-premises machine to connect to Azure and relay TCP traffic.

trans-unit.source: You must install the manager to an on-premises computer that can connect to the your SQL Server instance.
trans-unit.target: You must install the manager to an on-premises computer that can connect to the your SQL Server instance.

trans-unit.source: The connection you just created should have a **Status** of **On-premesis setup incomplete**.
trans-unit.target: The connection you just created should have a **Status** of **On-premesis setup incomplete**.

trans-unit.source: Click this connection and click **On-premises Setup**.
trans-unit.target: Click this connection and click **On-premises Setup**.

trans-unit.source: This installs a customized instance of the Connection Manager, which is already pre-configured to work with the hybrid connection you just created.
trans-unit.target: This installs a customized instance of the Connection Manager, which is already pre-configured to work with the hybrid connection you just created.

trans-unit.source: Complete the rest of the setup steps for the Connection Manager.
trans-unit.target: Complete the rest of the setup steps for the Connection Manager.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is complete, the hybrid connection status will change to **1 Instance Connected**.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is complete, the hybrid connection status will change to **1 Instance Connected**.

trans-unit.source: You may need to refresh the browser and wait a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: You may need to refresh the browser and wait a few minutes.

trans-unit.source: The hybrid connection setup is now complete.
trans-unit.target: The hybrid connection setup is now complete.
